SELECT T0.ROW_ID , T0.COMPANY_CODE, T0.NICK_NAME, T1.COMPANY_NAME, T1.SUP_COMPANY_ID, T0.USER_NAME, T0.`PASSWORD`, T0.RESET_KEY, T0.USER_TYPE, T0.EMPLOYEE_ID, T0.NOTES, T0.SORT_NBR, T0.`STATUS`, T0.DELETED_FLAG, T0.ORIGIN_FLAG, T0.ORIGIN_APP, T0.IS_INIT_PW, T1.ROW_ID AS T1_ROW_ID, T1.NOTES AS T1_NOTES, T1.SORT_NBR AS T1_SORT_NBR, T1.`STATUS` AS T1_STATUS , T1.DELETED_FLAG AS T1_DELETED_FLAG, T1.ORIGIN_FLAG AS T1_ORIGIN_FLAG , T1.ORIGIN_APP AS T1_ORIGIN_APP, T1.COMPANY_CODE, T1.SORT_NAME, T1.COMPANY_NAME_EN, T1.IS_BLOC, T1.COMPANY_CLASS, T1.COMPANY_TYPE, T1.COMPANY_SCALE, T1.TRACE_SOURCE, T1.TRACE_PEOPLE, T1.TP_CELL, T1.LOGO, T1.PROVINCE, T1.CITY, T1.COUNTY, T1.COMPANY_ADDRESS, T1.ID_CARD, T1.COMPANY_PHOTO, T1.LONGITUDE, T1.LATITUDE, T1.AREA, T1.REGISTER_TIME, T1.REGISTER_IP, T1.OPEN_TIME FROM hr_m_user T0 INNER JOIN hr_m_company T1 ON T0.`COMPANY_CODE` = T1.`COMPANY_CODE` AND T1.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T1.STATUS = '1' WHERE T1.COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T0.USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T0.DELETED_FLAG = 0 AND T0.STATUS = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE hr_m_user SET PASSWORD=#{password},IS_INIT_PW='N' where ROW_ID=#{rowId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.`ROW_ID`, u.`COMPANY_CODE`, u.`USER_NAME`, u.`NICK_NAME`, u.`PASSWORD`, u.`RESET_KEY`, u.`USER_TYPE`, u.`EMPLOYEE_ID`, u.`NOTES`, u.`SORT_NBR`, u.`STATUS`, u.`DELETED_FLAG`, u.`ORIGIN_FLAG`, u.`ORIGIN_APP`, c.ROW_ID AS T1_ROW_ID, c.NOTES AS T1_NOTES, c.SORT_NBR AS T1_SORT_NBR, c.`STATUS` AS T1_STATUS , c.DELETED_FLAG AS T1_DELETED_FLAG, c.ORIGIN_FLAG AS T1_ORIGIN_FLAG , c.ORIGIN_APP AS T1_ORIGIN_APP, c.COMPANY_CODE, c.SORT_NAME, c.COMPANY_NAME_EN, c.IS_BLOC, c.COMPANY_CLASS, c.COMPANY_TYPE, c.COMPANY_SCALE, c.TRACE_SOURCE, c.TRACE_PEOPLE, c.TP_CELL, c.LOGO, c.PROVINCE, c.CITY, c.COUNTY, c.COMPANY_ADDRESS, c.ID_CARD, c.COMPANY_PHOTO, c.LONGITUDE, c.LATITUDE, c.AREA, c.REGISTER_TIME, c.REGISTER_IP, c.OPEN_TIME, c.SUP_COMPANY_ID FROM `hr_m_user` u INNER JOIN `hr_m_company` c ON u.`COMPANY_CODE`= c.`COMPANY_CODE` AND u.`USER_NAME`=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
